languages.text: "Господин губернатор с шайкой прихвостней своих все за спинами нашими прятались, а сейчас, как припекло, сбежать собрались. А нас тут оставляют подыхать! После того, как мы кровь за него проливали и спину гнули, чтобы всем его обеспечить! Разве это честно, {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}гроксова{/g} ты лепешка?!" {n}Шоковая дубинка бьет губернатора в грудь, украшения на его мундире издают мелодичный перезвон.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Господин губернатор с шайкой прихвостней своих все за спинами нашими прятались, а сейчас, как припекло, сбежать собрались. А нас тут оставляют подыхать! После того, как мы кровь за него проливали и спину гнули, чтобы всем его обеспечить! Разве это честно, гроксова ты лепешка?!" {n}Приклад бьет в грудь губернатора, украшения на его мундире издают мелодичный перезвон.{/n}

languages.text: "Our esteemed governor and his gang of cronies have been cowering behind us, and now, when things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! We've shed our blood for him and broken our backs to provide for him! And after all this? You think that's fair, you piece of {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxshit{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Господин губернатор с шайкой прихвостней своих все за спинами нашими прятались, а сейчас, как припекло, сбежать собрались. А нас тут оставляют подыхать! После того, как мы кровь за него проливали и спину гнули, чтобы всем его обеспечить! Разве это честно, {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}гроксова{/g} ты лепешка?!" {n}Шоковая дубинка бьет губернатора в грудь, украшения на его мундире издают мелодичный перезвон.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Our esteemed governor with his gaggle of cronies hid behind our backs, and now that things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! After we shed our blood for him and broke our backs to supply him with everything! You think that's fair, you groxpat?" {n}Malgar's shock baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's tunic to jingle melodiously.{/n}

"Our esteemed governor with his gaggle of cronies hid behind our backs, and now that things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! After we shed our blood for him and broke our backs to supply him with everything! You think that's fair, you groxpat?" {n}Malgar's shock baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's tunic to jingle melodiously.{/n}

You think that's fair, you {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxcrap{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}

We've shed our blood for him and broken our backs to provide for him! And after all this? You think that's fair, you {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxcrap{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}

"Our esteemed governor and his gang of cronies have been cowering behind us, and now, when things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! "Our esteemed governor and his gang of cronies have been cowering behind us, and now, when things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! We've shed our blood for him and broken our backs to provide for him! And after all this? You think that's fair, you piece of {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxshit{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}

languages.text: "Unser ehrenwerter Gouverneur und seine Bande von Lakaien haben sich hinter unserem Rücken versteckt, und jetzt, wo es ungemütlich wird, wollten sie sich aus dem Staub machen. Und uns hier verrecken lassen! Wir haben unser Blut vergossen und unsere Körper geschunden, um ihn zu versorgen! Und nach all dem? Haltet Ihr das etwa für fair, Ihr riesiger Haufen {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Groxscheiße{/g}?" {n}Malgars Schockknüppel trifft den Gouverneur an der Brust, wodurch die Medaillen und Abzeichen im Chor zu klimpern beginnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed governor and his gang of cronies have been cowering behind us, and now, when things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! We've shed our blood for him and broken our backs to provide for him! And after all this? You think that's fair, you piece of {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxshit{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Unser ehrenwerter Gouverneur und seine Bande von Lakaien haben sich hinter unserem Rücken versteckt, und jetzt, wo es ungemütlich wird, wollten sie sich aus dem Staub machen. Und uns hier verrecken lassen! Wir haben unser Blut vergossen und unsere Körper geschunden, um ihn zu versorgen! Und nach all dem? Haltet Ihr das etwa für fair, Ihr riesiger Haufen {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Groxscheiße{/g}?" {n}Malgars Schockknüppel trifft den Gouverneur an der Brust, wodurch die Medaillen und Abzeichen im Chor zu klimpern beginnen.{/n}

languages.text: « Notre très estimé gouverneur et sa bande de truands sont restés planqués bien au chaud à l'arrière, et maintenant que ça commence à chauffer pour leurs fesses, ils ont cru pouvoir se faire la malle et nous laisser crever ici ! On a saigné pour lui, on s'est pété le tronc pour lui... et tout ça pour quoi, hein ? Tu trouves ça juste, {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}fiente de grox{/g} ? » {n}La matraque paralysante de Malgar frappe le gouverneur à la poitrine, faisant tinter les décorations de son uniforme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed governor and his gang of cronies have been cowering behind us, and now, when things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! We've shed our blood for him and broken our backs to provide for him! And after all this? You think that's fair, you piece of {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxshit{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Notre très estimé gouverneur et sa bande de truands sont restés planqués bien au chaud à l'arrière, et maintenant que ça commence à chauffer pour leurs fesses, ils ont cru pouvoir se faire la malle et nous laisser crever ici ! On a saigné pour lui, on s'est pété le tronc pour lui... et tout ça pour quoi, hein ? Tu trouves ça juste, {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}fiente de grox{/g} ? » {n}La matraque paralysante de Malgar frappe le gouverneur à la poitrine, faisant tinter les décorations de son uniforme.{/n}

languages.text: “我们尊敬的总督和他那群亲信一直躲在我们背后，可现在，局势变得越来越糟糕，他们就打算一走了之，把我们丢在这里等死！我们为他流过汗，流过血！可他却打算把我们丢在这里等死？你觉得这公平吗？你这坨{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}拉出来的臭屎！”{n}马尔加一棍打在总督胸口，总督制服上的装饰被打得叮当作响。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed governor and his gang of cronies have been cowering behind us, and now, when things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! We've shed our blood for him and broken our backs to provide for him! And after all this? You think that's fair, you piece of {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxshit{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们尊敬的总督和他那群亲信一直躲在我们背后，可现在，局势变得越来越糟糕，他们就打算一走了之，把我们丢在这里等死！我们为他流过汗，流过血！可他却打算把我们丢在这里等死？你觉得这公平吗？你这个{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽养的杂种{/g}！”{n}马尔加一棍打在总督胸口，总督制服上的装饰被打得叮当作响。{/n}

languages.text: 「偉大なる我らが総督とその取り巻きどもは、我々の背後に恐怖で隠れていた。そして戦闘になると我々を見殺しにした！我々は奴のために血を流し、骨身を削ってきたのだ！その結果がこれか？これが公正だと思うのか、{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}クソ野郎{/g}め！」{n}マルガーのスタンバトンが総督の胸に命中し、総督の制服の飾りが一斉に鳴り響く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed governor and his gang of cronies have been cowering behind us, and now, when things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! We've shed our blood for him and broken our backs to provide for him! And after all this? You think that's fair, you piece of {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxshit{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「偉大なる我らが総督とその取り巻きどもは、我々の背後に隠れていた。そして戦闘になると我々を見殺しにした！我々は奴のために血を流し、骨身を削ってきたのだ！その結果がこれか？これが公正だと思うのか、{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}め！」{n} マルガーのスタンバトンが知事の胸に命中し、知事の制服の飾りが一斉に鳴り響く。{/n}

languages.text: «Nuestro estimado gobernador y sus secuaces se han estado escondiendo cobardemente detrás de nosotros, y ahora, cuando las cosas se han puesto feas, han pensado que podían largarse. ¡Y dejarnos morir! ¡Hemos derramado nuestra sangre por él y nos hemos roto la espalda para mantenerle! ¿Y después de todo? ¿Crees que eso es justo, pedazo de {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}mierda de grox{/g}?». {n}La porra aturdidora de Malgar golpea al gobernador en el pecho, haciendo que los adornos del uniforme del gobernador tintineen al unísono.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed governor and his gang of cronies have been cowering behind us, and now, when things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! We've shed our blood for him and broken our backs to provide for him! And after all this? You think that's fair, you piece of {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxshit{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro estimado gobernador y sus secuaces se han estado escondiendo a nuestras espaldas, y ahora, cuando las cosas se han puesto feas, han pensado que podían largarse. ¡Y dejarnos morir! ¡Hemos derramado nuestra sangre por él y nos hemos roto la espalda para mantenerle! ¿Y después de todo? ¿Crees que eso es justo, {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}?». {n}La porra aturdidora de Malgar golpea al gobernador en el pecho, haciendo que los adornos del uniforme del gobernador tintineen al unísono.{/n}

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer valimiz ve ekürileri ardımıza sinmiş, keyifleri yerindeydi. Ortalık kızışınca da tüyebileceklerini düşündüler, bizi burada ölüme terk edeceklerdi! Onlar için kanımızı döktük, hizmet etmek için belimizi büktük ama onların yaptığına bak! Adaletin bu mu ulan {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g} dölü?" {n}Malgar'ın şok jopu valinin göğsüne çarpınca üniformasındaki süslemeler hep birlikte şıngırdıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed governor and his gang of cronies have been cowering behind us, and now, when things got rough, they thought they could scarper. And leave us here to die! We've shed our blood for him and broken our backs to provide for him! And after all this? You think that's fair, you piece of {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxshit{/g}?" {n}Malgar's stun baton hits the governor in the chest, causing the adornments on the governor's uniform to jingle in unison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Saygıdeğer valimiz ve saz arkadaşları arkamızda güvendeydi. İşler sarpa sarınca kaçabileceklerini düşündüler, bizi burada ölüme terk edeceklerdi! Onlar için kanımızı döktük, hizmet etmek için belimizi büktük ama onların yaptığına bak! Adaletin bu mu ulan {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g} dölü?" {n}Malgar'ın şok çubuğu valinin göğsüne çarpınca üniformasındaki süslemeler hep birlikte şıngırdıyor.{/n}
